description: TWO PHASE SELECTION PROCESS This is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier, and the prequalification list will not be used in any other solicitation.
full_summary:
### ITQ-EC015-241429-CRA Saint John NB Fit-up
#### Announcement Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4509480204-Doc4517615827
* **Publication Date**: April 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 18, 2024, 14:00:00 GMT
* **Contracting Entity**: Canada Revenue Agency (Department of Public Works and Government Services)

#### Description of Work

Canada Revenue Agency invites proposals for a two-phase selection process for the fit-up of the Government of Canada building located at 126 Prince William Street in Saint John, NB. The scope of work includes demolition of existing walls to create a new floor plan within existing workspaces on the 3rd and 5th floor.

The contract consists of two phases:
1. Phase One: Qualification Evaluation
    * Suppliers will be evaluated based on their qualifications.
    * Qualified suppliers will proceed to Phase Two.
2. Phase Two: Financial Bid
    * Qualified suppliers will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Specifications and Timeline

* **Estimated Cost**: between $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 (HST included)
* **Timeline**: Contractors must complete the work within 14 weeks from the award of the contract.

#### Requirements and Submissions

* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* **Pre-Qualification List**: The prequalification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Sonia Stockman (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19281936?extsite=MTkyODE5MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### About the Tender

* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.  Please note, this tender was closed on the announced closing date and is not currently open for responses.   You can use the notice URL to find out more about this
